snippet.title: Bear Soul(2021) - Trailer
snippet.description:
Return a bear appearance by passing levels and fight against evil in various shapes. Rescue your cub from the wizard's hands and bring peace to the forest. All this and much more in Bear Soul games.
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1638730/Bear_Soul/
